Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the suspension of a health club contract
Summary: Relates to the suspension of a health club contract; allows a buyer to suspend payment for services until access to a facility or premises has been restored or the right to a credit for dues and fees paid.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the suspension of a health club contract
